title: karuNA kaTAkSuDamma
sahitya:
karuNA kaTAkSuDamma I mauni kamanIya yatirAjuDamma


caraNam 1    ati vishvarUpuDamma I mauni acyutani dASuDamma 
aparimita krpa kAruDE I mauni atyanta guNasAndruDE
    caraNam 2    kAmita phaladuDamma I mauni sEvita varaduDamma 
pAlinci mammElukO aniyiTlu prArthinci sEvintamA
    caraNam 3    tungAvihAruDamma I mauni durita nivAruDamma
mangaLAkAruDamma I mauni sundara hrdayuDamma
    caraNam 4    gOpAmba timmaNNa sutuDE aina bhAgyambu entayu kadavE
vEdAnta sAruDamma mamubrOva vEgamE rammandumA
    caraNam 5    shrI rAghavEndruDamma mahanIya gururAya dhIruDamma 
mIvacci kApADavE aniyiTlu pUjinci pADudAmA
